scripts.push: git subtree push --prefix build origin gh-pages
scripts._push:force_note: On windows, the nested command in the `backticks` doesn't work.  You need to run the command separately
scripts.push:force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix build master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run push
scripts.test: echo "This template does not include a test runner by default." && exit 1
